topic.title: Search index examples
topic.shortdesc: Step-by-step tutorials with sample keyspaces, tables, and data that demonstrate DSE Search index functionality.

body.p: Use these step-by-step tutorials with sample keyspaces, tables, and data to learn how to setup and use DSE Search index functionality.

ul.li: Tutorial how to index and query geospatial Polygons and MultiPolygons.
Docker container for running Silk on DSE Search.
